text: The Two-Headed Monster is a light purple monster on "Sesame Street". It first appeared in 1978 in Season 9. ==Performers== The performers for the Two-Headed Monster are listed below: * Richard Hunt and Peter Friedman (ca. 1978) * Jerry Nelson and Richard Hunt (1978–1991) * Jerry Nelson and Adam Hunt (1995) * Jerry Nelson and David Rudman (1998–2000) * Joey Mazzarino and David Rudman (2001–2016) * Eric Jacobson and David Rudman (2016–present) Category:Sesame Street characters
title: Two-Headed Monster
